ComicInfo.Title: Catalyst Part 3; Chapter 8 Reunited
ComicInfo.Summary:
The gang arrives in Tokyo to meet the second master.
Theo's spiritual advisors talk while Theo takes a test.
Aspen is reunited with her brother.
Miya and others fight saber-tooth cats.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:24:43. [Issue ID 355043]
